```{r}
find_hash <- function(secret, stop_criterion) {
  cpt <- 1

  repeat {
    if (cpt %% 10000 == 0) print(cpt)
    hash <- openssl::md5(paste0(secret, cpt))

    if (all(str_sub(hash, 1, 5) == stop_criterion)) {
      break
    }

    cpt <- cpt + 1
  }

  return(cpt)
}

secret <- "iwrupvqb"
```

## Part 1

```{r}
res1 <- find_hash(secret, "00000")
res1
```

## Part 2

```{r}
res2 <- find_hash(secret, "000000")
res2
```
